Class GL32C

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
overrungl.opengl.GL11C

overrungl.opengl.GL30C
overrungl.opengl.GL31C
overrungl.opengl.GL32C
Direct Known Subclasses:
GL33C
public sealed class GL32C extends GL31C permits GL33C
GL32C relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL32C refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GL32C when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 3.2 core profile functions.

These extensions are promoted in this version:

  • GL_ARB_draw_elements_base_vertex
  • GL_ARB_provoking_vertex
  • GL_ARB_sync
  • GL_ARB_texture_multisample
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
